version_description:
- Private photos has been added, which are inaccessible unless you grant the user access
- Added option to change your location, to see girls in other areas
- Profile preview, which allows you to see your profile as it will be shown to other girls
- You can see Questionnaire answers of other girls
- You can change your Questionnaire answers
- There is new section Liked, where will be displayed all the girls that liked you
- You can reset swiped cards if you ran out, to give them second chance
 - Introduced premium features
- Fixed some more bugs

- You can now set advanced filters to show girls just for you
- You can set your relationships status
- Added stickers to Chat
- Stability and performance improvements

- Added Touch ID/Face ID protection
- Ability to hide your Age and Distance
- Added Private mode
This version brings you a lot of bug fixes and improvements to chat and browse !

Our goal is to make Zoe interactive, so we’ve integrated notification feed, hearts in-app purchases and your swipe history. We also wanted to show our new users how awesome is to have a premium membership so we’ve added a 7 day trial for that!
We’ve decided to brighten a day with 10 free power likes for our premium yearly users. Gamify the likes you section with revealing the profiles with hearts and redeem a free heart by watching ads.
We simplified onboarding! YAY! Start browsing profiles of people nearby without further ado! We also improved stability and performance so finding your soulmate is even smoother!
We simplified onboarding! YAY! Start browsing profiles of people nearby without further ado! We also improved stability and performance so finding your soulmate is even smoother!

Let’s speed up the game! New tapping feature will allow you to instantly browse through all the photos. We also added a super quick interactive tutorial for better navigation and fixed some minor bugs.

Wanna share your amazing adventures? We’ve got you covered! Connect your profile to Instagram to display your IG photos on your profile. Don’t have Instagram? With Premium you can upload unlimited pictures in your Album now!

Let’s welcome Spring in a brand-new outfit! Completely redesigned Zoe is now more user friendly and easier to navigate than ever before! We also added two new features to Zoe Premium for more dating opportunities!
• UNLIMITED REWINDS: Accidentally swiped left on the person of your dreams? Rewind your last swipe anytime.
• 5 DIRECT MESSAGES: Send them a pre-match key message to let them unlock your match.

Let’s welcome Spring in a brand-new outfit! Completely redesigned Zoe is now more user friendly and easier to navigate than ever before! We also added two new features to Zoe Premium for more dating opportunities!
• UNLIMITED REWINDS: Accidentally swiped left on the person of your dreams? Rewind your last swipe anytime.
• 5 DIRECT MESSAGES: Send them a pre-match key message to let them unlock your match.

Almost everyone loves music, but how to find out their top artists or the most favourite song? New version of Zoe will help you out with these questions thanks to Spotify integration right in the app! We also fixed couple of bugs and improved general stability and performance.
Improved photo switching on cards, fixed bug with two accounts, updated translations
Added a new way to sign - Apple sign-in. Some minor bugs fixed. Some added.

- New subscription screen
- Improved stability and performance

- Fixed issue loading swiping cards
- Fixed updating & completing profile
- New verification modal
- Added option to reset travel location
- Fixed message notifications not opening conversation

- Added swipe left to delete gesture to feed notifications
- Fixed issues with Facebook and Apple login

- Premium features tutorial
- Fixed issues with sending power messages
